# HMHomeManager

**Class**

The manager for a collection of one or more of a user’s homes.

## Declaration

```swift
class HMHomeManager
```

## Overview

HomeKit stores the user’s home automation information in a database that’s shared among Apple’s built-in iOS Home app, your HomeKit-enabled app, and apps from other developers. All these apps access the database as peers using the HomeKit framework.



Each app creates a single [doc://com.apple.homekit/documentation/HomeKit/HMHomeManager] instance to coordinate its HomeKit-related activities. The manager’s [doc://com.apple.homekit/documentation/HomeKit/HMHomeManager/homes] array gives your app access to a collection of [doc://com.apple.homekit/documentation/HomeKit/HMHome] instances that represent the user’s homes. These in turn contain references to the home automation accessories that your app can inspect and control.



Adopt the [doc://com.apple.homekit/documentation/HomeKit/HMHomeManagerDelegate] protocol in your app to stay informed of any changes to the set of homes made outside your app.

## Inspecting authorization status

- **authorizationStatus**: The current state of the app’s access to home data.
- **HMHomeManagerAuthorizationStatus**: The possible home-access states.

## Working with the home layout

- **homes**: An array of all homes managed by this home manager.
- **HMHome**: The primary unit of living space, typically composed of rooms organized into zones.

## Keeping track of connected homes

- **delegate**: A delegate that receives updates on the collection of homes.
- **HMHomeManagerDelegate**: An interface the home manager uses to communicate changes to the state of the home network.

## Adding and removing homes

- **addHome(withName:completionHandler:)**: Adds a new home to this home manager.
- **removeHome(_:completionHandler:)**: Removes a home from this home manager.

## Managing the primary home

- **primaryHome**: The primary home managed by this home manager.
- **updatePrimaryHome(_:completionHandler:)**: Updates the primary home of this home manager.

## Initializers

- **init()**

## Instance Methods

- **findVendorAccessory(hapPublicKey:completionHandler:)**

## Home Manager

- **Configuring a home automation device**: Give users a familiar experience when they manage HomeKit accessories.
- **Testing your app with the HomeKit Accessory Simulator**: Install the HomeKit Accessory Simulator to help you debug your HomeKit-enabled app.
